elements.name: inBondNumber
elements.description: The number identifying the in-bond movement.

elements.name: inBondEntryType
elements.description: The code representing the type of in-bond movement.

elements.name: usPortOfInBondDeparture
elements.description: In-bond port of departure in Schedule D code.

elements.name: usPortOfInBondArrival
elements.description: In-bond port of arrival in Schedule D code.

elements.name: inBondCreateDate
elements.description: A numeric date in MMDDYY (month, day, year) format representing the date of in-bond creation.

elements.name: dateOfInBondArrival
elements.description: A numeric date in MMDDYY (month, day, year) format representing the date of arrival of the in-bond.

elements.name: inBondQuantity
elements.description: This field is used when the in-bond quantity is less than the full bill quantity of the Bill of Lading. If not provided, the in-bond quantity will automatically be assumed to be full Bill quantity.
